column4: I'm not sure how chaotic this is. i'm not used to using chat clients. But I'm having difficulty playing a commercial DVD.
nick, you can try the "wubi" installer
done that. Have tried all that every post I can find has told me to do. I don't think it is a codec issue. Something in the way of software confusion is my best guess.
i'm not on windows, just curios that i can do a base install like debian, then install the otheers by hand
